title: We Step Into September 2024
description: We step into September 2024 with our latest community news, releases, showcases, and much more.
author: zortan

body.raw:
## September 2024

GM!  
We step into September 2024 with our latest community news, releases, showcases, and much more.

Check out our collectives here: [**NFT Indonesia Collective Page**](http://thehug.xyz/collectives/NFTindonesia_), and simply follow our fellow artist there to find out more about their works and journey with their art.

Ignorance and Hope by [**@absart6**](https://x.com/absart6).

### Genetic Recombination

Genetic Recombination by [**@naltanea**](https://x.com/naltanea).

This collection is a mix of genes from different creatures, aiming to create fresh visual experiences for us and other creatures to enjoy together. Humans rely heavily on the balance of our ecosystems. So, it's our job to protect them. If we mess this up, we'll end up as outsiders in a nature that craves destruction.

### Raden Saleh

Raden Saleh by [**@bywillak**](https://x.com/bywillak)

Raden Saleh was a renowned Indonesian artist of Javanese origin. He is considered one of the most important painters of the Dutch colonial period in Indonesia. Born in 1807, Raden Saleh first received training in traditional Javanese art. Later, he moved to Batavia (now Jakarta) to study Western art. He then traveled to Europe to further hone his skills and became the first Indonesian painter to gain recognition in Western art. Raden Saleh's works often portrayed scenes from Javanese life and European landscapes, showcasing his unique blend of indigenous and Western artistic styles.

See more of Willak's art and update here:  
[https://thehug.xyz/artists/will_ak](https://thehug.xyz/artists/will_ak)

### Contemplation

Contemplation by [**@Feriwe88**](https://x.com/Feriwe88).

This is my latest work, based on my black and white work (drawing) on paper then I put digital coloring to make illustration art.  
This work tells the story of a person who tries to distance himself from his previous life to receive enlightenment from God, well you know this is a way of life...contemplation...  
I took this idea from Javanese culture, about a powerful man who spent decades in a forest, well maybe he was like Sidharta Gautama in India.  
This person in Javanese culture is called Sunan Kali Jaga...he is a Javanese mystical symbol who is believed to bring enlightenment and inner peace...  
Hopefully, this can also be a symbol for all of you...

See more of Feriwe's art and update here:  
[https://thehug.xyz/artists/Feriwe88](https://thehug.xyz/artists/Feriwe88)

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"Raden Saleh was a renowned Indonesian artist of Javanese origin. He is considered one of the most important painters of the Dutch colonial period in Indonesia. Born in 1807, Raden Saleh first received training in traditional Javanese art. Later, he moved to Batavia (now Jakarta) to study Western art. He then traveled to Europe to further hone his skills and became the first Indonesian painter to gain recognition in Western art. Raden Saleh's works often portrayed scenes from Javanese life and European landscapes, showcasing his unique blend of indigenous and Western artistic styles."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/nota/nft-indonesia-xyz/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2f7fe076-998a-4bcf-84c2-b5756e720d3d.mdx",lineNumber:237,columnNumber:1},this),`
